colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA @006A *, ,GCIG GNYIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG ZER NGA LA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING SNYEN PA DANG, LNGA MO NAS NGO MTSAR CAN BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE, ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO LA CHO GA BAR, RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA DANG, MI SRID SNYAM PAS, SLOB GNYER LA BYAS PA'I SLOB DPON SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYI BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA RTEN NAS 'BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, DGE'O,, ,,)
author_simple: CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN,
